assignments.name: Short Answer 2
assignments.notes:
#200-250 words
#create a fictional scenario in which conflict exists. 
#describe a fictional example of a conflict in either home or work life to which one of the following two could apply: willingness to sacrifice; and turning the other cheek.
#explain how the technique plays out for the chars in your example.
#what is the outcome of the technique in the scenario
#what factors caused the technique to succeed or fail
